item.description:
The British pop/rock group known as leaders of the "British Invasion," had numerous top hits: " I’m Into Something Good," "Mrs. Brown, You’ve Got a Lovely Daughter," "I’m Henry the Eighth," "Can’t You Hear My Heartbeat," "Listen, People," and "Dandy." Bring something SMALL to share, a chair or blanket, and a smile. This should be a hoot, the only problem I can see with this event is that the music is so "catchy" that you'll be walking around for days singing "I'm Hen-er-ry the 8th I am", and people will look at you funny. I hope you'll join us.

Thanks to Conor, for suggesting this meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Purple and Yellow Balloons. That's us.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Herman's Hermits - - - - - - - Seriously!
